pkgmetadata.longdescription: Providing Interactive Interpretations and Explanations of Statistical Results // Allows to provide live interpretations and explanations of statistical functions in R. These interpretations and explanations are shown when the explained function is called by the user. They can interact with the values of the explained function's actual results to offer relevant, meaningful insights. The 'xplain' interpretations and explanations are based on an easy-to-use XML format that allows to include R code to interact with the returns of the explained function.
